data.text: @CTVNews You make it , you break it  you pay for it.

@CTVNews Oh brother...this again? When Canada's covid death rate is 15 times that of Hong Kong you should likely just keep quiet.  HK has had 577 covid related deaths for a pop of 7.5 million.  Canada has had over 36,000...and half of them in LTC.  Worry bout your own elders.
@CTVNews Where was CTV reporting when China crushed democracy in Hong Kong. Quiet.
@CTVNews We get to blame lack of natural immunity for covid infections, but we refuse to recognize natural immunity when it comes to vax passports and mandates?
